perturbation.original_text: Under this e-business Hosting Agreement ("Agreement") between International Business Machines Corporation ("IBM") and Bluefly, Inc. ("Customer"), IBM will provide Web hosting and related services ("Services") to Customer.
perturbation.changed_text: Under this e-business Hosting Agreement ("Agreement") between International Business Machines Corporation ("IBM") and Bluefly, Inc. ("Client"), IBM will provide Web hosting and related services ("Services") to Client.
perturbation.explanation: Changed 'Customer' to 'Client.' Later mentions of 'Customer' now create potential confusion as to whether 'Client' and 'Customer' are intended to be the same entity throughout the contract.

perturbation.original_text: Customer will pay or provide appropriate exemption documentation for all taxes, duties, levies, and any other fees (except for taxes based upon IBM's net income) related to the Services imposed by any governmental authorities.
perturbation.changed_text: The Client will pay or provide appropriate exemption documentation for all taxes, duties, levies, and any other fees (except for taxes based upon IBM's net income) related to the Services imposed by any governmental authorities.
perturbation.explanation: Change 'Customer' to 'The Client'. This creates contradiction with later definitions where it uses Customer and not Client. It is unclear whether “Client” and “Customer” are interchangeable.

perturbation.original_text: Each party is responsible for the supervision, direction, and control of its respective personnel. IBM reserves the right to determine the assignment of its personnel. IBM may subcontract portions of 8 the Services to Subcontractors and Affiliates selected by IBM.
perturbation.changed_text: Each party is responsible for the supervision, direction, and control of its respective workforce. IBM reserves the right to determine the assignment of its workforce. IBM may subcontract portions of 8 the Services to Subcontractors and Affiliates selected by IBM.
perturbation.explanation: Changed 'personnel' to 'workforce.' It is undefined whether 'personnel' and 'workforce' are the same thing. This creates potential for disputes over rights and responsibilities related to those words.
